alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 8:48AM MDT until March 22 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains, Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin, and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 11 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected during the evening hours. Roadways may see less accumulation due to the time of year and temperatures in the upper 20s.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin
